cs.SD, cs.SI, cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.SD. 

The paper deals with speech processing algorithms and noise reduction, which are related to signal processing and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.SD (Sound), which deals with audio and speech processing. The paper also involves hidden Markov models and nonnegative matrix factorization, which are common techniques in machine learning and data analysis. Therefore, cs.SI (Statistical Learning) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are also likely sub-categories. The paper also involves optimization algorithms such as expectation-maximization, which are common in machine learning and optimization. Therefore, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. Finally, since the paper involves speech enhancement, cs.SD is the most likely sub-category.
